Proyect1.Body: This script converts an image to ASCII art using characters. It is a simple tool that allows users to input an image and generate a text representation of it using ASCII characters.

Proyect2.Body: Color Picker is an application that allows you to select the color of a pixel on the screen and copy its hexadecimal value to the clipboard.

Proyect3.Body: A simple implementation of the classic Tic Tac Toe game. Play against a friend or the computer directly in your browser!

Proyect4.Body: h3rcode (h3rc) is a simplified dialect of C that replaces standard C keywords with custom ones. The compiler converts .h3rc files into standard C code, which can then be compiled and executed with a C compiler like GCC
